Content.Text:
Good morning. My apologies for calling on you
at this early hour, but I have some news that
might interest you.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've come today with a proposal for a new event.
<PAGE>
You have helped construct several new
environments in the Safari park, correct? I hear
many unique animals now reside there.
<PAGE>
I thought it would be a good opportunity to give
people a chance to see these unusual animals
through a <RED>Wild Safari</RED> tour. What do you think?
<PAGE>
Of course, I'm sure you have many other things
on your schedule, so the tour would only be at a
time convenient for you.
<PAGE>
And as you would be running the tour, all
proceeds from the sale of tickets would go to
you.
<PAGE>
With Agate to help you as a guide, I'm sure it
would be a resounding success. If you would
like to hold the tour...
<PAGE>
Please come to the <GREEN>Guild</GREEN> on <BLUE>Summer 10th</BLUE> each
year. The tour would begin between <BLUE>10:00 and
13:00</BLUE> on that day.
<PAGE>
We'd love to have your help, if you are
interested.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This year's <RED>Wild Safari</RED> is scheduled for today.
Does it look like you'll have the time to help?
<PAGE>
If you would like to join us, please come to the
<GREEN>guild</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00 and 13:00</BLUE>. We hope to see
you there.
